project_description: A framework combining differential geometry, topology, causal inference, and category theory to analyze AI security vulnerabilities

components.name: Security Manifold Engine
components.description: Uses differential geometry and topological data analysis to map security boundaries in AI systems

components.name: Causal Analysis Engine
components.description: Identifies causal pathways for security vulnerabilities and attack vectors

components.name: Scale Dynamics Analyzer
components.description: Analyzes how security properties evolve across model scales

components.name: Multi-Paradigm Integration
components.description: Uses category theory to create unified security abstractions

objective: Develop advanced red teaming capabilities for AI systems with a focus on competition scenarios and prompt injection techniques
